wendelj probably doesn't even wholly believe what he says, he's simply trolling. A troll is someone who posts inflammatory, extraneous, or off-topic messages in an online community with the primary intent of provoking readers into an emotional response or of otherwise disrupting normal on-topic discussion. Your reply is what they operate on; it is the consequence that drives them to continue to be trolls. See the wikipedia article on Operant Conditioning. Since punishment is unavailable to most users here (we can't ban him ourselves), the best response is none at all (refer to "extinction" in psychology).
